overview:
Andrew is the co-founder of Willstream Labs (willstream.com) a technology startup focused on simplifying payments to the emerging markets.

He has a decade worth of experience in the IT and Telecoms worlds working in engineering, development, sales and management roles around the world.

More interestingly (and importantly) he has designed and delivered innovative projects in some incredible countries - getting to know the people, what makes them tick and business thrive.

Willstream is the next chapter - an exciting, challenging and fun journey helping make life simpler through technology.
